extendedInfo.description: By the creators of http://www.liveWants.comThe penguins have come to town ... they're ready to hit the gym, dine out, and party hard!  Make your custom penguin happy and watch them come to life!Don't type your Facebook and Twitter status... shake it. Color Connect lets you share your status visually, using custom penguin avatars just by shaking your phone. Whether you're in class, busy working, hitting the gym, having fun in town, or whatever and you don't want to be on your phone typing, we have a penguin for you. Once you've selected your penguin, simply share your status through Facebook and Twitter using the Shake to Share feature.  Also set your penguin as a photo in your contact book and set it as your wallpaper. Be creative and donât forget to show your penguin some love, they love to be pet on the stomach.Then pat yourself on the back because Color Connect donates a portion of all profits to charity via causes.com.If you have a question/comment for Color Connect's CEO, feel free to reach out to him...he loves hearing from users!*Color Connect is the 2011 Peopleâs Choice and Category (Social Networking) winner of the VCast Power Your App Contest

reviews.title: Shares on Facebook, but not picture
reviews.comment: It shows a share on facebook, but only words and a box where the penguin picture is supposed to be. Tried more than once and it still did not work. Kind of pointless if it\'s not going to show the penguin picture too! That\'s the whole reason for dowloading the app.
